summary:
Aims to make Delphine more beautiful, and also increase her Agent & Warrior feeling,
through the cool hair, sharp eyes, and scars as gift from Thlamor.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-US3ZXowqNn0/ULZWI5N7niI/AAAAAAAAAXU/I_1meByX9Lw/s920/ENB%2520Comparison%2520Nexus%2520Background%25203%2520Narrow-3%2520920.jpg[/img]



Sorry for my funny English.. I'm Taiwanese.
      

17/11/17 -  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13606/?]The SE version is out.[/url] 




[b]--- DESCRIPTION ---[/b]


This is a simple facial makeover mod, Currently has 2 versions :

[b]D1 -[/b]


Aims to make Delphine more beautiful, and also increase her Agent & Warrior feeling,
through the cool hair, sharp eyes, and scars as gift from Thlamor.

And if you use face retexture with it, you can turn "AUNT" Delphine into "SISTER" Delphine!
( All of my screenshots are using Navetsea Face Retexture, and ENB. )

[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-TW8GrSlVdyA/ULcLXnPH1GI/AAAAAAAAAXo/PiJax9Xm140/s940/TESV%25202012-11-28%252005-58-31-69%2520W920.jpg[/img]

[b]D2 - Older Age Version[/b]


Hardcore immersion for hardcore player !!

I seriously recommended ENB to smooth the skin. lol

[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-cWqdVPkCYI4/ULlEgkaCLzI/AAAAAAAAAYw/lgcbGraxBpY/s920/Delphine%2520Makeover%2520D2-2%2520W920.jpg[/img]



And now both of D1 & D2 have Vanilla Hair Version.


[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-O8NsTkOajoY/ULw9JWKKIWI/AAAAAAAAAaI/sE0UtXcKGao/s920/Delphine%2520Makeover%2520Vanilla%2520Hair%2520Display%2520W920.png[/img]




[b]---- MOD USED ----[/b]


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

-REQUIRED. (Unless you choose vanilla hair version.)

(SPECIAL THANKS for apachii's license!!!)


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5106]Navetsea Face Retexture[/url]

-Not Required.
You can use vanilla or any other face textures,
but Delphine will looks Slightly Different than my Screenshots.


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498]High Quality Eyes[/url]

-Not Required.


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25451]Project Matso ENB[/url]

-Not Required.
And I guess you already have your own ENB Choice.

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-i_UcnPQNiq4/ULcOOx_kwFI/AAAAAAAAAX8/2pOR2hHxXPI/s940/Delphine%2520Makerover%2520Comparison%2520W940.jpg[/img]




[b]---- IMPORTANT ----[/b]


This mod has 2 versions : Delphine Makeover Navetsea & Delphine Makeover Standard.


Just Remember, if you are a Navetsea Face Retexture user, Download the Navetsea version.
And vanilla users, or all other face retexture users, just download the Standard version.

( If you wanna switch face textures from Navetsea to others, or from others to Navetsea. Switch the version too! )


Why I do this ? Because this is a solution for a tricky CK outport problem with Navetsea's Textures.
It might cause a issue about lips colour showing incorrectly.

I don't wanna spend too much time to explain this issue,
so just remember that simple principle, and you'll be fine^^




[b]---- Installation ----[/b]


Basic NMM Install, or just manually override the Data folder, then active esp.
Easy enough for everyone.

[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-LAUSAcaoPKg/UL0rA1kwr5I/AAAAAAAAAaw/dFRTcZJX7aI/s920/TESV%25202012-12-03%252011-41-02-79-2%2520W920.jpg[/img]




[b]--- Compatibility & Conflict ---[/b]


Will conflict with other mods that change Delphine's face too, of course.
Otherwise, should be no problem at all.

If you find any, please let me know.

[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-CJ7OprA1pYs/ULxr4MGfD6I/AAAAAAAAAaY/bE4H2929t-o/s920/TESV%25202012-12-03%252016-29-46-12-3%2520W920.jpg[/img]




[b]--- Update History ---[/b]


See the changes button on top.

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-2Rl4gTuhDeI/ULlX_XNQ0mI/AAAAAAAAAZo/w5a4MAw3N0w/s920/TESV%25202012-11-30%252003-40-25-06-2%2520W920-BlackBars.jpg[/img]




[b]--- Credits ---[/b]

Besthesda, and the whole wonderful mod community.


[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-vSRjRnfi74Q/ULZWGmOiSVI/AAAAAAAAAXM/swNMxEFZFe0/s920/TESV%25202012-11-28%252001-40-26-65-2%2520920.jpg[/img]
